title: Xerath is definitely bugged
body: I am continuing to see a bug where {{champion:101}} xeraths first ult shot would land directly on me no matter where my mouse is. i also went into  custom game, picked {{summoner:4}} flash and {{summoner:14}} ignite, got to level 6 and tested it out, the problem continued when i spammed my ult (the first shot would land on me). this happened 9/10 times and im pretty sure it wasn't programmed on puropse like that.

replies.body: Check your control configuration with advanced view. Is your ultimate/fourth ability set to "self-cast"?
